DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of the study is to determine if there is a difference in the number of women with a complete miscarriage after 10 days between expectant management versus treatment with 800 micrograms of misoprostol intravaginally in women with an an incomplete miscarriage before 14 weeks and a gestational sac retained in the uterus.
DOC.criteria: nonviable intrauterine pregnancy with retained gestational sac in the uterus the embryo if visible 5 to 35 mm without a heart beat vaginal bleeding circulatory stable hemoglobin at least 80 g/L contraindications against misoprostol
